name: Danganronpa: Maiden Voyage
description:
All aboard the Maiden Voyage of Despair!

Sail away with the wonderful class of Hope's Peak Europe into the middle of the ocean, where the only way to evacuate is through murder.

What can you trust?

Who will get a second chance at life?

Who is pulling the string from the shadows?

Meet an all-new cast, explore an all-new world with all-new gameplay and ever grizzly murders!

Coming soon!

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

What to expect of the all-new series:

Danganronpa: Maiden Voyage will be a fully functional fangame completely separate from the original Danganronpa series.

This story is based on the class of Hope's Peak Europe, the prestigious offshoot institution taking the 16 most talented students from Estonia to Portugal.

After finding themselves in the middle of the ocean, they are forced to kill each other to evacuate the ship.

With trials featuring fan-favourite minigames including Nonstop Debates and Scrum Debates, as well as many all-new gameplay sections including Challenge, Duel, Avalanche and Logic/Truth.

Expect deceit, betrayal and desperation to survive from a diverse cast commiting brutal murders.

All aboard the Maiden Voyage of Despair!

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Youtube Twitter

Fully made by:

The God Atua - Critic/Breaker/Music Director

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Danganronpa: Maiden Voyage is a not-for profit fangame based on Spike Chunsoft's Danganronpa. We are not affiliated with Spike Chunsoft.

This is a fangame.
